post_title: SOLD T206 Cobb Red PSA Graded
post_content:
FS: TY COBB 1909-11 T206 PORTRAIT- RED SWEET CAPORAL 350/30 BACK PSA A Authentic Altered. Not trimmed!! Nice as a PSA 3 maybe a 4

PSA A Authentic Altered grade comes from someone touching up a spot in top left hand corner with red ink/marker. I’ll also call out a slight crease at his forehead that is barely noticeable on rear of card but only goes from left edge to middle of Cobb’s forehead. See closeup pic for red touchup. Centering and registration are excellent with good color too.

SOLD or reasonable offer. Payment via PP F/F with free shipping. 

Not looking to trade on this one. 

Thanks
